snippet.textDisplay: Do you think that salt (saline) nasal sprays would be effective to reduce the amount of viral  load in the nasal cavity during the first few days of infection? Added to this, would drinking a small amount of whiskey help to clear the virus from your throat and upper respiratory tract?  I ask this because I have heard people who had Covid did this, and it helped them.
